name: CodeWorks: Visual Scripting Framework
description:
Hi guys, this is a visual Scripting IDE for for several game engines (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2mdtEj3od8M). Sort of one Visual Scripting IDE for multiple game engines. It enables users to develop game logic for one game and deploy it over multiple game engines. 

Supported Game Engines:

1) Game Guru

2)  LÖVE Engine

3) AppGameKit

4) Godot

5) Unity C#

6) Leadwerks

7) Copper Cube 6

8) S2 Engine

If it is of your interest then kindly consider supporting the project to its fruition. You can also suggest your own liking of a game engine which you think would become a part of this project. Project website: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/visual-scripting-framework-for-gameguru-3d-computers/x/17484966#/

Also, check out tutorial and what people have achieved with this: 

All credits to @smallg(lord of lua prog)  from Game Guru Forum...
